root.name: Windosill
root.description: GameplayIn Windosill, the player helps a small toy locomotive travel from a child's room to reach the stars. The game takes place in a series of small windowsills, each requiring some sort of dragging and clicking to produce a tiny white box. This item must then be inserted into a socket above a door on the right-hand side of the screen, unlocking the door and allowing the locomotive to proceed.The artwork, animation and code were done by Patrick Smith.System RequirementsPCOS: Windows XP/VistaProcessor: 2 GHz Pentium M or higherMemory: 256 MB RamGraphics: No special requirementsHard Drive: 8 MB Free spaceSound: No special requirementsMacComputer: Intel Mac, OS X 10.5 or laterHard Drive: 8MB of disk spacePeripherals: Mouse recommended (one button is fine)Useful linkshttp://smithpix.net/http://windosill.com/soundCredits.html
